_meanings:
<ab>N.</ab> of a 
mystical circle ({#cakra#}) or diagram with
the letters of the alphabet, such as
{#a, ka, qa, ma, a, ka, Ta, ha#} &c. written
therein and used in determining
the auspicious or inauspicious stars
of a person; ({#grAhyagopAlamaMtrasya-#} 
{#taMtroktamaMtragrahaRArTaM-tattanmaMtrARAM#} 
{#SuBASuBavicAropayogI cakraBedaH#} <ls>Tv.</ls>)
